translations: n.科学论派的鼓吹者；教徒

sentences.sentence: Everyone I knew was a Scientologist.
sentences.translation: 我认识的任一个人都是山达基信徒。

sentences.sentence: With another Scientologist, Haggis completed a script, which he called "quite dreadful."
sentences.translation: 哈吉斯和另一个山达基人写完了这个脚本，他自己说写得“糟透了”。

sentences.sentence: At night, he wrote scripts on spec.He met Skip Press, another young writer who was a Scientologist.
sentences.translation: 晚上，他按要求写剧本，他遇到了Skip Press，另一个信奉山达基教的年轻作家。
